name: The Fetid Rot of a Man's Ambition
name_original: The Fetid Rot of a Man's Ambition
description:
Made in Bitsy by Adam Le Doux using the bitsymuse hack by David Mowatt

Music:

  • Blueberries by Viktor Krauss
  • Eerie Curious Music by Lantz Minatus

Sfx by kgatto, qubodup, Otis James, pillonoise, and fredzed
